name: array.prototype.flat

1.2.1.name: array.prototype.flat
1.2.1.description: An ESnext spec-compliant `Array.prototype.flat` shim/polyfill/replacement that works as far down as ES3.

scripts.tests-only: npm run --silent test:shimmed && npm run --silent test:module
